page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT EVENTS
page.content: North Leverton has no facilities for indoor{ENTERTAINMENT}except the school hall. South Leverton has a Memorial Institute built in 1921. In North Leverton there is quite a lot of entertainment. The school holds discos for former pupils and for the children at school. We have concerts for parents and senior citizens. Sports Day include running,the sack,skipping and egg and spoon races,field events and tug of war. Feast Day include an original dance "Stomp" around the village and games at the school with stalls,raffles and refreshments. In the South Leverton Institute there are classes in ballet dancing,tap dancing, bingo and keep-fit.{EVENTS}Christmas parties, concerts, nativity plays, Chapel Anniversary, garden parties, bonfire parties, Village Fete, Feast, Flower Show,Sunday school plays.
